mapper.select:
select
from dish where dish.dish_delete_or_not=1 and dish.dish_id=#{dishId}

select
from dish where dish.dish_delete_or_not=1 and dish.dish_category_id=#{dishCategoryId}

select
from dish,collect_dish where dish.dish_id=collect_dish.collect_dish_id and dish.dish_delete_or_not=1 and collect_dish.collect_dish_delete_or_not=1 and collect_dish.collect_customer_id=#{customerId}

select
from dish ,dish_category,restaurant where dish.dish_category_id=dish_category.dish_category_id and dish_category.dish_category_restaurant_id=restaurant.restaurant_id and dish.dish_delete_or_not=1 and dish.dish_category_delete_or_not=1 and restaurant.restaurant_delete_or_not=1 and restaurant.restaurant_id=#{restaurantId}
